mode.tooltip: Editing of game logic, quests, and entities

message.name: cel.messenger.action.Message
message.description: Usual destination: 'World' entity. This will display an on-screen message to the player

message.name: ares.controller.Spawn
message.description: Usual destination: 'World' entity. This will spawn a new dynamic object in front of the camera

message.name: ares.controller.CreateEntity
message.description: Usual destination: 'World' entity. This will create a new entity from an entity template

message.name: ares.controller.StartDrag
message.description: Usual destination: 'World' entity. This will start dragging the object in front of the camera

message.name: ares.controller.StopDrag
message.description: Usual destination: 'World' entity. This will stop the current dragging operation

message.name: ares.controller.Examine
message.description: Usual destination: 'World' entity. This will show a description of the object in front of the camera if that object has a description

message.name: ares.controller.Pickup
message.description: Usual destination: 'World' entity. This will pick up the item in front of the camera if that item can be picked up

message.name: ares.controller.Activate
message.description: Usual destination: 'World' entity. This will activate the object in front of the camera. If the object has an assiciated entity then it will get a message of type 'ares.Activate'. If the item can be picked up then it will be picked up. Otherwise the player will start dragging it

message.name: ares.Activate
message.description: Usual destination: any entity. This message is typically sent from the game controller when an entity is activated
